description: Collects metric values from Nagios plugins

paramSchema.title: Check Name
paramSchema.name: name
paramSchema.description: Name of this Nagios plugin check

paramSchema.title: Check Command
paramSchema.name: cmd
paramSchema.description: Path to the Nagios plugin check executable or script

paramSchema.title: Check Command Arguments
paramSchema.name: args
paramSchema.description: Arguments to pass to the Nagios plugin check executable or script

paramSchema.title: Source
paramSchema.name: source
paramSchema.description: Source to use for the collected measurement

paramSchema.title: Poll Time (ms)
paramSchema.name: interval
paramSchema.description: How often to call the Nagios plugin check executable or script. Defaults 5 seconds
